text:
@piersmorgan Thu komun kowld iz a #coronavirus and thu dokturs & klevur peepl hav nevur been aybul tu get a #Vaxeen for that, hav thai?
Its orl a bit dyoobeus, iff yoo arsk mee!🤔
I howp im rong, but ownli tym wil tel iff i wil evur see mi frendz agen.
I kan ownli bi gud and stai in mi howm.
